description: Shrewsbury and Bristol Rovers play out a 0-0 League One draw at the Croud Meadow in a crucial match at the foot of the table.
title: Shrewsbury Town 0-0 Bristol Rovers
title_page: Shrewsbury Town 0-0 Bristol Rovers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Shrewsbury have only won one of their last seven league meetings with Bristol Rovers (D2 L4), a 2-1 vicotry in May 2023.
Bristol Rovers have won three of their last four Football League away games at Shrewsbury (L1), as many as their previous 15 beforehand (W3 D3 L9).
Shrewsbury are currently on a run of three successive home league defeats, last losing four in a row in May 2021.
Bristol Rovers have lost eight of their last nine away league games (W1), including their last four in a row; not since April 2021 have they lost more in a row (6).
